properties.name: AllowClaim
properties.help: Flag indicating if the VM should be created as claimable.

properties.name: Artifacts
properties.help: JSON encoded array of artifacts to be applied. Use '@{file}' to load from a file.

properties.name: DiskType
properties.help: Storage type to use for virtual machine.

properties.name: ExpirationDate
properties.help: The expiration date in UTC(YYYY-mm-dd) for the VM.

properties.name: Formula
properties.help: Name of the formula. Use `az lab formula list` for available formulas.

properties.name: GenerateSshKeys
properties.help: Generate SSH public and private key files if missing.

properties.name: Image
properties.help: The name of the operating system image (gallery image name or custom image name/ID).

properties.name: ImageType
properties.help: Type of the image. Allowed values are: gallery, custom.

properties.name: Notes
properties.help: Notes for the virtual machine.

properties.name: Size
properties.help: The size of the VM to be created. See https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/virtual-machines/ for size info.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in `key[=value]` format.

properties.name: AdminPassword
properties.help: Password for the VM admin.

properties.name: AdminUsername
properties.help: Username for the VM admin.

properties.name: AuthenticationType
properties.help: Type of authentication allowed for the VM. Allowed values are: password, ssh.

properties.name: SavedSecret
properties.help: Name of the saved secret to be used for authentication.

properties.name: SshKey
properties.help: The SSH public key or public key file path. Use `--generate-ssh-keys` to generate SSH keys.

properties.name: IpConfiguration
properties.help: Type of IP configuration to use for the VM. Allowed values are: shared, public, private.

properties.name: Subnet
properties.help: Name of the subnet to add the VM to.

properties.name: VnetName
properties.help: Name of the virtual network to add the VM to.
